annotationDesign.description: Annotation project design parameters: annotator assignment, adjudication, and quality criteria.

redundancy.description: How annotators are assigned to items.

guidelinesRef.description: AT-URI of the annotation guidelines document (e.g., a pub.layers.persona or external resource).

guidelinesVersion.description: Version identifier for the annotation guidelines.

annotationRounds.description: Number of annotation passes in the project workflow.

redundancySpec.description: How many annotators work on each item and how they are assigned.

count.description: Number of independent annotators per item.

assignmentStrategyUri.description: AT-URI of the assignment strategy definition node. Community-expandable via knowledge graph.

assignmentStrategy.description: How annotators are assigned to items (fallback when assignmentStrategyUri unavailable).

annotatorPool.description: Total number of annotators in the project.

adjudicationSpec.description: How disagreements between annotators are resolved into a final annotation.

methodUri.description: AT-URI of the adjudication method definition node. Community-expandable via knowledge graph.

dedicatedAdjudicator.description: Whether a separate adjudicator (not one of the annotators) resolves disagreements.

agreementThreshold.description: Agreement level (0-1000) above which adjudication is skipped.

qualityCriterion.description: An acceptance criterion for annotation quality.

metricUri.description: AT-URI of the metric definition node. Community-expandable via knowledge graph.

metric.description: Agreement or quality metric (fallback when metricUri unavailable).

scopeUri.description: AT-URI of the evaluation scope definition node. Community-expandable via knowledge graph.
